content: developed by megan lapp aka crafty intentions this crochet pattern is for a beaded möbius strip fidget it is recommended for beginner level or above a small möbius strip fidget from this pattern is approximately 2 x 2 inches a medium möbius strip fidget is approximately 3 x 3 inches a large möbius strip fidget is approximately 4 x 4 inches this pattern is written in u s terminology for a printer-friendly version selectively print only the page range designated text only in the table of contents have fun for the mobius strip fidget pattern tutorial go here https //www youtube com/watch v=v1fxsuuxq7w&t=7s page | 1 © 2024 megan lapp crafty intentions™ all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ table of contents materials list 2 glossary of terms 3 foreword 3 beaded möbius strip fidget tips 4 lightly beaded möbius strip fidget 13 heavily beaded möbius strip fidget 21 finished photos 28 text only beaded möbius strip fidget tips 30 text only lightly beaded möbius strip fidget 32 text only heavily beaded möbius strip fidget 35 eu safety and compliance document 37 materials list yarn in worsted/medium/4 weight all amounts are approximate this pattern requires a yardage range of 20 to 50 yards of worsted/medium/4 weight yarn depending on the options used small möbius strip fidget approximately 20 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn medium möbius strip fidget approximately 30 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn large möbius strip fidget approximately 40 -
